#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,i,a,b,count=0;
		cin>>n;
		for(a=2;a<n;a++)
		{
			b=a+1;
			while(b<=n)
			{
				if((a*b)%(a+b)==0)
				{
					count++;
					//cout<<a<<"  "<<b<<"  "<<count<<endl;
				}
				b++;
			}
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
